ygData.subject: RE: EQ plat was: Elf Hide gloves : was trading the stei n comments
ygData.msgSnippet: One thing to keep in mind... EQ plat has no value in and of itself.  Banks do not pay interest.  There is no provision in the economy for capital investment.
ygData.messageBody:
One thing to keep in mind... EQ plat has no value in and of itself. Banks
do not pay interest. There is no provision in the economy for capital
investment. Money is just a store of value or meduim of exchange. 500pp in
the bank is worthless. A pair of Elf Hide Gloves has true value - stats &
prestige. The person who paid 375pp for them obvious felt that they were
worth it compared to having 375pp in the bank doing nothing.

Granted - he may have a hard time getting 375pp back out of them but if he
wanted them that bad - he probably wont even think of getting rid of them.
As you get older, your access to plats gets easier, your stuffs get better.
So now you have most everything you want to wear and you have 800pp in the
bank rotting away - now when you see something you want - you can pretty
much have it.

What drives most deals (sales) of items is how bad the buyer wants something
and the convenience of getting it. I have been on both sides of pretty many
deals.

Here we are in the Oasis d' Mar
/auction Polar Bear Cloak AC8 +10HP +20svCold great for casters anyone can
wear 40pp obo

/ooc that's a rip they cost only 5pp

/ooc yes but first travel to everfrost - get polar bear skin - hire a ranger
- 4 hours to find karg - then he gets killed for his GZ - 4 more hours to
find karg - 5pp to karg and travel back home

/tell sylly will you take 30pp? can you meet me at the docks?

/tell whoever omw!

Sylly.

-----Original Message-----
From: Jesse [mailto:j@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 8:04 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Elf Hide gloves : was trading
the stein comments

From: Jesse <j@...>


> Well, I was at the Cazic-Thule bazaar last saturday and a
pair of EH gloves
> went for 375 plat. So by my reckoning a dozen set of
gloves is 4500 plat!

Someone really got taken then. On my server they go for 40pp
to 75pp tops.
most of the people I've talked to on others said it was
around the same
price.
